resources.string: Welcome to RPG Quiz, a written RPG where you\'ll be confronted to different situations and will have to make tough choices. You cannot go back. Using the back key will undo all your progress. Closing the app as well.

You wake up in a cold stone room. You don\'t remember what brought you here. You look around for a way out. You see two doors. One on your left and the other right in front of you. Which do you go through?
I\'ll take the one on the left.
Let\'s go through the front door.

You open the door that was to your left. You enter and suddenly you fall into a pit. The ground has collapsed. Fortunately, you fell into some sand and you\'re unharmed. You observe your surroundings and come to the conclusion that you can climb back to the door. You also see a shiny object, buried in the sand. You decide to…
Climb to the door. I need to get out of here!
Shiny means valuable. We can always go back after that.
You came in the front door? Or maybe you touched a glittering object? Doesn\'t matter. You\'ve forgotten why you\'re here again. Only two choices can be made.
Go back to the main room you started in
Go in the corner to meditate
You realize that whatever you do, nothing changes. You can\'t escape. You\'re stuck, time to make a choice.
Go through the door on the on the left
